content.raw:
You can set `enableGroundTruth:=true` in the arguments to `ign launch`. This will publish TF messages with ground truth transforms for each vehicle. The topic `<robot name>/pose` will also include a transform from the world frame to each vehicle.

Edit: I have updated the wiki to reflect this: #!/osrf/subt/wiki/api#markdown-header-ground-truth-pose
content.html:
You can set enableGroundTruth:=true in the arguments to ign launch. This will publish TF messages with ground truth transforms for each vehicle. The topic <robot name>/pose will also include a transform from the world frame to each vehicle.

Edit: I have updated the wiki to reflect this: #!/osrf/subt/wiki/api#markdown-header-ground-truth-pose
